column4: Yo I am looking for a Diagramming program for ubuntu.  Is there anything out there that comes  close to OmniGraffle?
what kind of kiagramming program.
well I like to wireframe for web development also some UML
but anything that makes making flowcharts and wireframes with nice iconset
well I don't even need nice icon set
just something that is clean and easy to work with
not sure what UML is but wireframe...Blender is the cats meow..if you're use to it.
haha the cats meow
the 3d tool?
yep
err... nah not 3d wireframe
like a website wirefram
these are common things that diagramming software is used for
not sure I know what the diff is...
you mean like a diagram with imbedded notes etc..?
a software to buidl flowcharts, uml digrams and website wireframes
ah.. ok.. there's several.. hang on...
I see DIA and Inkscape
but they suck balls
Vym, kdissert & freemind.. Personally I like Vym with branches & trees, imbedded links, notes, graphics etc.. It also outputs to xml or xhtml..but kdissert is more like a flowchart.
I know them as mind mappers.
wow nice Scunizi thanks looking into these now
I use Vym to keep track of stuff like this....
